title: Did not receive any epic skins
body:
Hi everyone,
I am a skin collector and have almost all of the skins (I bought all of the purchasable skins already). After finishing one match today, I did not receive any rewards for the epic skins - rune pages mission. I am pretty upset. 
Any explanation or compensation for this situation?

replies.body: I looked into this for you...and it looks like you already own everything that would be eligible so there's nothing to grant.  >.<  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if we could find other options for you.
